properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lord Jesus died there, On calvary’s tree. His own blood was shed there For you and for me. My old self was nailed there, So sin could not reign, With Jesus I died there, It wasn’t in vain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have a new life through Jesus Christ, I’ve risen with Him. I am a new creature now through Him, With pow’r over sin.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’m buried with Jesus, My old self is dead, Exchanged for a new life, With Jesus instead. When Jesus arose there From death and the grave, My sins were forgiven, And new life He gave.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have a new life through Jesus Christ, Complete in God’s son With pow’r over sin and death and hell, The victory’s won.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The life that I now live, By faith in God’s son, My Jesus lives through me, The victory’s won. I live now for Jesus, I walk in His way, I yield to His Spirit His will to obey.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come rule all my life, Lord Jesus Christ Be master and king. Come rule all my life, Lord Jesus Christ You’re my everything. (to the tune of Chariots of Fire){/lang-eng}
